summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Grade 5 Scholarship Examination Platform with new professional academic design. Fixed critical login navigation bug. All backend APIs working (100% success rate). All 4 role logins working. Professional design with Educational Reforms Bureau branding verified across all dashboards.

Login authentication for all 4 roles (admin, teacher, student, parent)
Exam listing and filtering APIs
Exam creation and publishing (teacher operations)
Role-based access control
Login page - Educational Reforms Bureau branding visible
Login page - Digital square logo (11x11 pixelated grid) displays correctly
Login page - Building Future Scholars slogan present
Login page - Copyright 2026 found
Login page - Grade 5 Scholarship Exam Portal title present
Login page - Excellence in Education Since 1982 text present
Admin Dashboard - Loads successfully after login
Admin Dashboard - Professional header with shield icon
Admin Dashboard - Stats cards display (Students, Exams, Teachers, Parents)
Admin Dashboard - Add User button functional
Admin Dashboard - Search users input present
Admin Dashboard - User management table with 4 users
Admin Dashboard - Left padding (lg:pl-48) for desktop
Admin Dashboard - Orange color scheme (#F59E0B)
Teacher Dashboard - Loads successfully after login
Teacher Dashboard - Professional header with book icon
Teacher Dashboard - Stats cards display (Total Exams, Published, Drafts, Students)
Teacher Dashboard - Create Exam button present
Teacher Dashboard - Paper 2 Marking button present
Teacher Dashboard - Exam list displays correctly (5 exams)
Student Dashboard - Loads successfully after login
Student Dashboard - Professional header with book icon
Student Dashboard - Stats cards display (Available Exams, Completed, Avg Score)
Student Dashboard - Available exams display (5 exams)
Student Dashboard - Start Exam buttons present
Parent Dashboard - Loads successfully after login
Parent Dashboard - Professional header with users icon
Parent Dashboard - Stats cards display (Linked Children, Avg Progress, Completed Exams)
Parent Dashboard - Link Student button present
Parent Dashboard - Children progress cards display (1 child)
Responsive design - Tablet view (768x1024) works correctly
Responsive design - Mobile view (390x844) works correctly
Consistent branding across all pages
Professional design with warm orange/yellow color scheme
Proper spacing and padding on all pages

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All login flows, dashboards, and design elements working)
